trait.name: Reduced Threat
entries: A reduced-threat monster takes a −2 penalty on attack rolls (included in the stat block), ability checks (included in the stat block for skill proficiencies), saving throws (included in the stat block for saving throw proficiencies), and saving throw DCs (included in the stat block).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
